mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(num),0)+1 as bnum FROM jspdb.zboard
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jspdb.zboard (num, readcount, username, passwd, subject, content, email, filename, ip, regdate) VALUES (#{num},#{readcount},#{username},#{passwd},#{subject},#{content},#{email},#{filename},#{ip}, current_timestamp )
